name: Dune2000 Arakis Battle Commander
description:
#####################################
Become The Planet Arakis World Ruler And
Almighty Leader.
Build Up A Strong Base.
Construct And Upgrade Various Structures
as Battle-Commander Of The House Atreides.
Construct A Ixian Research Center And Do
Research To Unlock The Ability Of Constructing
New And Better Structures, Research Options,
And Units.
Raise Your FirePower Bonus And Defence
Bonus.
Shorten The Spice Production Time And
Max-Construction-Amount.
Collect Spice And Increase Your Power
Production.
Produce Various Types Of Atreides,
Imperial, And Native Inhabit Units.
Get The Ability To Produce Some
Unit-Type's Stolen From The Enemy Houses.
Spy Upon The Enemy And Launch Multiple
Attacks On The Enemy Units And Bases.
Overcome Enemy Attacks And Destroy The
Enemy Houses.
[The Houses Ordos And Harkonnen]
Become Mighty And The Planet Arakis
World Leader.
Become The Real Emperor.
###################################

###################################
Take Command over a small Atreides Base.
Construct and Build-Up a Base.
Establish Your Base And Research Various
Options.
Produce Various Units.
Improve your Base, Units , Defense and
Research.
Spy On the Enemy And Launch Multiple
Attacks.
Destroy the Enemy Units And Structures
And Conquer The Enemy Base.
Destroy All The enemy Bases And Become
the Ultimate Commander.
Destroy The Ordos And Harkonnen And Become
the Arakis World Leader.
###################################

###################################
Establish A Base.
Improve Your Base.
Upgrade Your Research.
Unlock And Produce Various Units.
Spy And Attack The Enemy.
Destroy And Conquer The Enemy.
Collect Spice And Increase Your Power
Production.
Complete Tasks And Become The Arakis
World Ruler.
###################################

###################################
This is the Android Real-Time Strategy Game
"Arakis Battle Commander" APK.
In This game you take control as a Commander
over a base from the House Atreides on the
Planet Arakis.
You Need to Construct and Upgrade a strong
base on the planet.
You Need to do Research and upgrade your
Research with the Ixian Research Center
to Unlock new Structures And Units.
You need to upgrade some structures to
unlock some new units and Research.
You can Produce Atreides, Harkonnen,
Ordos and Imperial Units.
Produce a strong Army and launch
Attacks on the Enemy Bases.
Destroy Enemy Units and Bases.
Overcome Enemy Attacks.
Fight Epic Battles and Become the
Mighty Emperor.
Good Luck Commander!
###################################
